title: [FEATURE] Ctrl+R fuzzy history search for input

logs.msg: Implemented Ctrl+R fuzzy history search. Added HistorySearchState with query, matches, selected. Handler for HistorySearch mode in events.rs. Rendering in direct.rs showing matches above input with bash-style prompt. Navigation: Ctrl+R/Up=older, Down/Ctrl+N=newer, Enter=select, Esc=cancel.
